# geometry

**Instance Property**

The shape or shapes associated with the GeoJSON feature.

## Declaration

```swift
var geometry: [any MKShape & MKGeoJSONObject] { get }
```

## Feature properties

- **identifier**: An optional identifier the class returns as a string.
- **properties**: Optional serialized JSON data that corresponds to the properties key.
